definition: knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)

sentences.english: Political parties and voters have no freedom of speech, assembly and association in society.
sentences.chinese: 各政党和选民没有言论集会和结社自由。

sentences.english: Ban citizen's groups. Deny the freedom of society.
sentences.chinese: 禁止民间组织，禁止结社自由。

sentences.english: We continue to hope that the Russian leadership will ensure that such freedom of association remains secure.
sentences.chinese: 我们已一再要求俄罗斯领导人继续保障结社自由。

sentences.english: Freedom of association is regarded as a threat by dictators .
sentences.chinese: 结社自由是政党专制或大人物专权的克星。

sentences.english: The freedoms to assemble and associate also apply in cyberspace.
sentences.chinese: 集会与结社自由同样适用于网络空间。

definition: International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights (ICCPR)
pinyin: gong1 min2 quan2 li4 he2 zheng4 zhi4 quan2 li4 guo2 ji4 gong1 yue1
related.word: 公民权利和政治权利国际公约
